definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc
to pile up/to heap up/a mass/pile/heap/stack/large amount
to dig into piles of outdated writings (idiom); to study old books and papers

sentences.english: The scholar delved into lots of old books and papers for the facts.
sentences.chinese: 這位學者鑽在故紙堆裏尋找資料。
